questions.question: Yimaphi amafomula asetshenziswa ukubala indawo ye-triangle?
questions.explanation: Indawo ye-triangle ibalwa ngo-1/2 ubude × ukuphakama (half base times height).

questions.question: Yintoni umhlaba ojikelezayo?
questions.explanation: Umhlaba ujikeleza ilanga kwaye inyanga ijikeleza umhlaba.

questions.question: Iyini umsebenzi we-mitochondrion eselulwaneni?
questions.explanation: I-mitochondrion iyingxenye yesel eyenza amandla e-ATP ngokusebenzisa i-cellular respiration.

questions.passage: Nelson Mandela was imprisoned for 27 years. Upon his release, he led South Africa into democracy and became the country's first Black president in 1994.

questions.question: How long was Nelson Mandela imprisoned?
questions.explanation: The passage clearly states he was imprisoned for 27 years.

questions.question: What leadership role did he take after release?
questions.explanation: He became South Africa's first Black president in 1994.
